prompt: By Prolands blade!!  What are you doing here?

replies.1: I was told there was an amazing warrior over here slaying the undead... Are you him?

prompt: I am... I am the Undead Slayer and the fact you have heard of me and found me must mean you talked to my father.

replies.1: I did and I will let him know you are still alive and kicking undead boney ass!
